name: STRATAS FOODS - Food Ingredients Division Foodservice Private Label Shortening
description: Stratas Foods is one of the largest edible oil manufacturers in the USA with a comprehensive line of shortening products that meet the needs of our customers. We are a proud supplier of private label shortening products for many of the largest bakery distributors. For the highest performing quality shortenings Stratas Foods is the solution for all your shortening needs.
